Package control

Class ShowingController

java.lang.Object
control.DatabaseController<Showing>
control.ShowingController
public class ShowingController extends DatabaseController<Showing>
Represents a ShowingController which contains the logic for handling Showing data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ShowingController()
    Creates a ShowingController with the file path of the showing database file to access.

  • Method Details

    • findShowing

      public Showing findShowing(int id)
      Returns a showing by searching with its showing id in the showing database. Overloaded method.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of showing to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns showing with matching id if found in database, else null.

    • findShowing

      public Showing findShowing(Cinema cinema, LocalDateTime showTime)
      Returns a showing by searching with its cinema and showtime in the showing database. Overloaded method.
      Parameters:
      cinema - Cinema of the showing to be searched.
      showTime - Showtime of the showing to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns showing with matching cinema and showtime if found in database, else null.

    • findShowings

      public ArrayList<Showing> findShowings(Cineplex cineplex, Movie movie)
      Returns a list of showings by searching with their cineplex and movie in the showing database. Overloaded method.
      Parameters:
      cineplex - Cineplex of the showings to be searched.
      movie - Movie of the showings to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of showings with matching cineplex and movie if found in database, else null.

    • findShowings

      public ArrayList<Showing> findShowings(Movie movie)
      Returns a list of showings by searching with their movie in the showing database. Overloaded method.
      Parameters:
      movie - Movie of the showings to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of showings with matching movie if found in database, else null.

    • findShowings

      public ArrayList<Showing> findShowings(Cineplex cineplex)
      Returns a list of showings by searching with their cineplex in the showing database. Overloaded method.
      Parameters:
      cineplex - Cineplex of the showings to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of showings with matching cineplex if found in database, else null.

    • deleteInvalidShowings

      public void deleteInvalidShowings(Movie movie, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Deletes all showings with showtimes that no longer fall within the valid showing period from the Showing database, for the given movie. A movie's showing period is from 7 days before its release date to its end date. Called from CRUDMovieListingUI when releaseDate or endDate attribute is updated.
      Parameters:
      movie - Selected movie.
      releaseDate - Release date of the selected movie.
      endDate - End date of selected movie.

    • updateShowingAttribute

      public void updateShowingAttribute(Showing showing, Enumerators.ShowingAttribute attribute, Object newAttributeValue)
      Updates the selected showing's entry in Showing database with the given new attribute.
      Parameters:
      showing - Showing to be updated.
      attribute - Showing attribute to be updated.
      newAttributeValue - New attribute value.

    • deleteShowing

      public boolean deleteShowing(int id)
      Deletes showing by searching with the given showing id in the showing database. Overloaded function.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the showing to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if showing is successfully deleted, else false.

    • deleteShowing

      public void deleteShowing(Movie movie)
      Deletes showing by searching with the given movie in the showing database. Overloaded function.
      Parameters:
      movie - Movie of the showing to be deleted.
